featured.text: Dr. Begall and her colleagues wanted to know whether larger mammals also have the ability to perceive magnetic fields.
RTRI officials explain that deer have a habit of repeatedly snorting short, shrill sounds to alert other deer when they perceive danger.

definition.en_def: To become aware of something through the senses or to understand something in a particular way.
definition.example: She can perceive the subtle changes in his mood.
